name: DataTable
description: DataTable displays data in tabular format.

value.label: value
value.title: An array of objects to display.

data-key.label: dataKey
data-key.title: Name of the field that uniquely identifies the a record in the data.

rows.label: rows
rows.title: Number of rows to display per page.

first.label: first
first.title: Index of the first row to be displayed.

total-records.label: totalRecords
total-records.title: Number of total records, defaults to length of value when not defined.

paginator.label: paginator
paginator.title: When specified as true, enables the pagination.

paginator-position.label: paginatorPosition
paginator-position.title: Position of the paginator, options are "top","bottom" or "both".

always-show-paginator.label: alwaysShowPaginator
always-show-paginator.title: Whether to show it even there is only one page.

paginator-template.label: paginatorTemplate
paginator-template.title: emplate of the paginator.
paginator-template.default: FirstPageLink PrevPageLink PageLinks NextPageLink LastPageLink CurrentPageReport RowsPerPageDropdown

page-link-size.label: pageLinkSize
page-link-size.title: Number of page links to display.

rows-per-page-options.label: rowsPerPageOptions
rows-per-page-options.title: Array of integer values to display inside rows per page dropdown.

current-page-report-template.label: currentPageReportTemplate
current-page-report-template.title: Template of the current page report element.

lazy.label: lazy
lazy.title: Defines if data is loaded and interacted with in lazy manner.

loading.label: loading
loading.title: Displays a loader to indicate data load is in progress.

loading-icon.label: loadingIcon
loading-icon.title: The icon to show while indicating data load is in progress.

sort-field.label: sortField
sort-field.title: Property name or a getter function of a row data used for sorting by default

sort-order.label: sortOrder
sort-order.title: Order to sort the data by default.

default-sort-order.label: defaultSortOrder
default-sort-order.title: Default sort order of an unsorted column.

multi-sort-meta.label: multiSortMeta
multi-sort-meta.title: An array of SortMeta objects to sort the data by default in multiple sort mode.

sort-mode.label: sortMode
sort-mode.title: Defines whether sorting works on single column or on multiple columns.

removable-sort.label: removableSort
removable-sort.title: When enabled, columns can have an un-sorted state.

filters.label: filters
filters.title: Filters object with key-value pairs to define the filters.

filter-display.label: filterDisplay
filter-display.title: Layout of the filter elements, valid values are "row" and "menu".

filter-locale.label: filterLocale
filter-locale.title: Locale to use in filtering. The default locale is the host environment's current locale.

selection.label: selection
selection.title: Selected row in single mode or an array of values in multiple mode.

selection-mode.label: selectionMode
selection-mode.title: Specifies the selection mode, valid values are "single" and "multiple".

compare-selection-by.label: compareSelectionBy
compare-selection-by.title: Algorithm to define if a row is selected, valid values are "equals" that compares by reference and "deepEquals" that compares all fields.

meta-key-selection.label: metaKeySelection
meta-key-selection.title: Defines whether metaKey is requred or not for the selection. When true metaKey needs to be pressed to select or unselect an item and when set to false selection of each item can be toggled individually. On touch enabled devices, metaKeySelection is turned off automatically.

context-menu-selection.label: contextMenuSelection
context-menu-selection.title: Selected row instance with the ContextMenu.

row-hover.label: rowHover
row-hover.title: When enabled, background of the rows change on hover.

csv-separator.label: csvSeparator
csv-separator.title: Character to use as the csv separator.

auto-layout.label: autoLayout
auto-layout.title: Whether the cell widths scale according to their content or not. Does not apply to scrollable tables.

resizable-columns.label: resizableColumns
resizable-columns.title: When enabled, columns can be resized using drag and drop.

column-resize-mode.label: columnResizeMode
column-resize-mode.title: Defines whether the overall table width should change on column resize, valid values are "fit" and "expand".

reorderable-columns.label: reorderableColumns
reorderable-columns.title: When enabled, columns can be reordered using drag and drop.

expanded-rows.label: expandedRows
expanded-rows.title: A collection of row data display as expanded.

expanded-row-icon.label: expandedRowIcon
expanded-row-icon.title: Icon of the row toggler to display the row as expanded.

collapsed-row-icon.label: collapsedRowIcon
collapsed-row-icon.title: Icon of the row toggler to display the row as collapsed.

row-group-mode.label: rowGroupMode
row-group-mode.title: Defines the row group mode, valid options are "subheader" and "rowspan".

group-rows-by.label: groupRowsBy
group-rows-by.title: One or more field names to use in row grouping.

expandable-row-groups.label: expandableRowGroups
expandable-row-groups.title: Whether the row groups can be expandable.

expanded-row-groups.label: expandedRowGroups
expanded-row-groups.title: An array of group field values whose groups would be rendered as expanded.

state-storage.label: stateStorage
state-storage.title: Defines where a stateful table keeps its state, valid values are "session" for sessionStorage and "local" for localStorage.

state-key.label: stateKey
state-key.title: Unique identifier of a stateful table to use in state storage.

edit-mode.label: editMode
edit-mode.title: Defines the incell editing mode, valid options are "cell" and "row".

editing-rows.label: editingRows
editing-rows.title: A collection of rows to represent the current editing data in row edit mode.

row-class.label: rowClass
row-class.title: A function that takes the row data and returns a string to apply a particular class for the row.

row-style.label: rowStyle
row-style.title: A function that takes the row data as a parameter and returns the inline style for the corresponding row.

scrollable.label: scrollable
scrollable.title: When specified, enables horizontal and/or vertical scrolling.

scroll-direction.label: scrollDirection
scroll-direction.title: Orientation of the scrolling, options are "vertical", "horizontal" and "both".

scroll-height.label: scrollHeight
scroll-height.title: Height of the scroll viewport in fixed units or the "flex" keyword for a dynamic size.

virtual-scroller-options.label: virtualScrollerOptions
virtual-scroller-options.title: Whether to use the virtualScroller feature. The properties of VirtualScroller component can be used like an object in it. Note: Currently only vertical orientation mode is supported.

frozen-value.label: frozenValue
frozen-value.title: Items of the frozen part in scrollable DataTable.

responsive-layout.label: responsiveLayout
responsive-layout.title: Defines the responsive mode, valid options are "stack" and "scroll".

breakpoint.label: breakpoint
breakpoint.title: The breakpoint to define the maximum width boundary when using stack responsive layout.

show-gridlines.label: showGridlines
show-gridlines.title: Whether to show grid lines between cells.

striped-rows.label: stripedRows
striped-rows.title: Whether to displays rows with alternating colors.

size.label: size
size.title: Defines the size of the table.

table-style.label: tableStyle
table-style.title: Inline style of the table element.

table-class.label: tableClass
table-class.title: Style class of the table element.

pt.label: pt
pt.title: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

unstyled.label: unstyled
unstyled.title: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

slots.name: header
slots.title: Custom content for the component's header.

slots.name: paginatorstart
slots.title: Custom content for the component paginator's left side.

slots.name: paginatorend
slots.title: Custom content for the component paginator's right side.

slots.name: footer
slots.title: Custom content for the component's footer.

slots.name: groupheader
slots.title: Custom content for the component's subgroup header.

slots.name: groupfooter
slots.title: Custom content for the component's subgroup footer.

slots.name: reorderindicatorupicon
slots.title: Custom reorder indicator up icon template.

slots.name: reorderindicatordownicon
slots.title: Custom reorder indicator down icon template.

slots.name: paginatorfirstpagelinkicon
slots.title: Custom paginator first page link icon template.

slots.name: paginatorprevpagelinkicon
slots.title: Custom paginator prev page link icon template.

slots.name: paginatornextpagelinkicon
slots.title: Custom paginator next page link icon template.

slots.name: paginatorlastpagelinkicon
slots.title: Custom paginator last page link icon template.

events.name: page
events.title: Callback to invoke on pagination. Sort and Filter information is also available for lazy loading implementation.

arguments.name: event.rows
arguments.description: Number of rows to display in new page

events.name: sort
events.title: Callback to invoke on sort. Page and Filter information is also available for lazy loading implementation.

arguments.name: event.rows
arguments.description: Number of rows to display in new page

events.name: filter
events.title: Event to emit after filtering, not triggered in lazy mode.

arguments.name: event.rows
arguments.description: Number of rows to display in new page

events.name: value-change
events.title: Invoked after filtering, sorting, pagination and cell editing to pass the rendered value.

events.name: row-click
events.title: Callback to invoke when a row is clicked.

events.name: row-contextmenu
events.title: Callback to invoke when a row is selected with a ContextMenu

events.name: row-select
events.title: Callback to invoke when a row is selected.

arguments.name: event.type
arguments.description: Type of the selection, valid values are "row", "radio" or "checkbox".

events.name: row-unselect
events.title: Callback to invoke when a row is unselected.

arguments.name: event.type
arguments.description: Type of the selection, valid values are "row", "radio" or "checkbox".

events.name: select-all-change
events.title: Callback to invoke when all data is selected.

events.name: column-resize-end
events.title: Callback to invoke when a column is resized.

arguments.name: event.element
arguments.description: DOM element of the resized column.

events.name: column-reorder
events.title: Callback to invoke when a column is reordered.

events.name: row-reorder
events.title: Callback to invoke when a row is reordered.

events.name: row-expand
events.title: Callback to invoke when a row is expanded.

events.name: row-collapse
events.title: Callback to invoke when a row is collapsed.

events.name: rowgroup-expand
events.title: Callback to invoke when a row group is expanded.

events.name: rowgroup-collapse
events.title: Callback to invoke when a row group is collapsed.

events.name: cell-edit-init
events.title: Callback to invoke when cell edit is initiated.

arguments.name: event.field
arguments.description: Field name of the row data.

arguments.name: event.index
arguments.description: Index of the row data to edit.

events.name: cell-edit-complete
events.title: Callback to invoke when cell edit is completed.

arguments.name: event.value
arguments.description: Field value of row data to edit.

arguments.name: event.newValue
arguments.description: Field value of new row data after editing

arguments.name: event.field
arguments.description: Field name of the row data.

arguments.name: event.index
arguments.description: Index of the row data to edit.

arguments.name: event.type
arguments.description: Type of completion such as "enter", "outside" or "tab".

events.name: cell-edit-cancel
events.title: Callback to invoke when cell edit is cancelled with escape key.

arguments.name: event.field
arguments.description: Field name of the row data.

arguments.name: event.index
arguments.description: Index of the row data to edit.

events.name: row-edit-init
events.title: Callback to invoke when row edit is initiated.

arguments.name: event.field
arguments.description: Field name of the row data.

arguments.name: event.index
arguments.description: Index of the row data to edit.

events.name: row-edit-save
events.title: Callback to invoke when row edit is saved.

arguments.name: event.field
arguments.description: Field name of the row data.

arguments.name: event.index
arguments.description: Index of the row data to edit.

events.name: row-edit-cancel
events.title: Callback to invoke when row edit is cancelled.

arguments.name: event.field
arguments.description: Field name of the row data.

arguments.name: event.index
arguments.description: Index of the row data to edit.

events.name: state-save
events.title: Invoked when a stateful table saves the state.

arguments.name: event.rows
arguments.description: Number of rows to display in new page

arguments.name: event.columnWidths
arguments.description: Comma separated list of column widths

arguments.name: event.expandedRows
arguments.description: Instances of rows in expanded state

arguments.name: event.expandedRowKeys
arguments.description: Keys of rows in expanded state

arguments.name: event.expandedRowGroups
arguments.description: Instances of row groups in expanded state

events.name: state-restore
events.title: Invoked when a stateful table restores the state.

arguments.name: event.rows
arguments.description: Number of rows to display in new page

arguments.name: event.columnWidths
arguments.description: Comma separated list of column widths

arguments.name: event.expandedRows
arguments.description: Instances of rows in expanded state

arguments.name: event.expandedRowKeys
arguments.description: Keys of rows in expanded state

arguments.name: event.expandedRowGroups
arguments.description: Instances of row groups in expanded state
